---
description: A layout container using Flex.
---

import { View } from '@bitdesign/sparks.content.view';
import { Flex } from './flex';

The Flex component can be used to layout its children in one dimension with flexbox. 

## Basic usage

Use the flex layout component:

```js
<Flex>
  <View />
  <View />
  <View />
</Flex>
```

By default, it uses `row` direction and provides a spacing normal gap. 

### Verical layout

Use the `direction` prop to control the layout flex direction:

```js live
<Flex diretion="column" gap={8}>
  <View backgroundColor="aqua" />
  <View backgroundColor="blue" />
  <View backgroundColor="navy" />
</Flex>
```
